entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
